creator: apri_naresh97@yahoo.com
text:
Throws NullPointerException during rendering of a circle with GradientPaint.

java.lang.NullPointerException
        at org.apache.batik.svggen.SVGGeneratorContext.doubleString(Unknown 
Source)
        at org.apache.batik.svggen.SVGGraphicObjectConverter.doubleString
(Unknown Source)
        at org.apache.batik.svggen.SVGEllipse.toSVGCircle(Unknown Source)
        at org.apache.batik.svggen.SVGEllipse.toSVG(Unknown Source)
        at org.apache.batik.svggen.SVGShape.toSVG(Unknown Source)
        at org.apache.batik.svggen.SVGGraphics2D.fill(Unknown Source)
        at org.apache.batik.ext.awt.g2d.AbstractGraphics2D.fillOval(Unknown 
Source)

This happens if the Point1 and Point2 for GradientPaint is specified outside 
the bounds of circle.

Ex: Specify the gradient paint with Point1 at TopLeft corner of the bounding 
rectangle and Point2 at BottomRight corner of the bounding rectangle.
creator: apri_naresh97@yahoo.com

text:
Thanks for reporting this bug. I have just commited a fix in the CVS repository
along with a regression test.
creator: vincent.hardy@sun.com
vincent.hardy@sun.com
text: *** Bug 21567 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
